CustomField.description: Appointed role of Data Protection Officer Knowledge of Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) regulation: -Appointed role of Data Protection Officer -Ability to develop and implement good policies and practices for handling personal data that meet our organisation's needs. -Ability to communicate the policies and practices clearly to employees and customers. -Ability to communicate the policies and practices clearly to employees and customers.
